content.rendered:
Friday, October 11, 2024 

Today is a “B” Day

Club Meetings and Information 

  • Chamber orchestra auditions will take place today in the orchestra room after school from 2:30 – 3:00 pm. Please make sure that you have signed up for an audition. You will need a ride home! 
     
  • The Scholastic Book Fair will be held in the library next week, Tuesday through Friday! All 6th graders will be coming during ELA Reading and Writing Skills classes. 7th and 8th graders will be able to come in small groups during flex and study halls. Have your parents load an eWallet online, or bring cash. Contact Ms. Whitcher with any questions! 
     
  • Attention Maple Ave Ski Club members! You should be signing up online for your West Mountain lift pass this week in order to get the best price! Prices will go up after October 15. 
     
  • Attention students. It is time to redeem your LiveSchool points! Look for an announcement in Canvas to visit our online shop on October 16th to place your order. The order form will close at the end of the day on Monday the 21st as we pack orders for delivery on or before October 31st. If you miss this opportunity, keep listening to the morning announcements for November’s online order dates and information! And keep following the 4 Bs to earn more points and make Maple Avenue a great place to be.  
  • Maple Avenue Middle School Musical Club is thrilled to announce our show for this year-Matilda! If you would like to audition or apply for a backstage position, please go to your house office and ask for an audition form or a backstage form. Auditions will be done online and will be accepted until October 12th. 
     
  • 6th graders!! There will be a Halloween dance on Friday, October 25, here at Maple from 7pm to 9pm. Join us for food, dancing, and fun! It will be a spooktacular time! Tickets will be sold online only through ParentSquare. You are encouraged to wear a costume but it is not required, however, keep in mind there can be nothing covering your face and no toy weapons will be allowed. We hope to see you there!!

 Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
